name: ANG Timeline
author: Aleksandr Glovatskyy

sections.description:
ANG Timeline is a responsive WordPress Plugin that allows you to create beautiful vertical storyline and a series of events that you can assign to that timeline.
This plugin adds the ‘timeline’ custom post type to your WordPress blog. By default, the plugin will append timeline meta information (timeline value) to the timeline post.
It will prepend text element(date) to timeline posts. Timeline widget allows you select any registered image size to show in timeline post.

Working demos are available here:

LIVE DEMO Esta

LIVE DEMO Endeavor

LIVE DEMO BizOrg

Timeline Tabs (ANG Timeline Pro)

LIVE DEMO Renter

Github

  • GitHub Repository

Features

  • Custom post type ‘timeline’;
  • Custom taxonomy;
  • Custom widget.
  • Compatible with all active post types of your theme.
  • Responsive and mobile ready.
  • Smooth scroll animation.
  • UiKit based animation
  • Clean minimalist design.
  • Specify Timeline Title.
  • Set the Timeline post image.
  • Specify the length to trim each story.
  • Hide the read more button for each story.
  • Specify Timeline post featured Image size.
  • Show or hide Timeline title.
  • Show or hide Timelene story date.
  • Specify Story date format.
  • Spesify number of stories to be shown.
  • Specify order type format.s
  • Timeline tabs* (Pro).
  • Timeline tabs shortcode with extended options* (Pro).
  • Specify any post type and any taxonomy which your WordPress theme supports* (Pro).
  • Tabs users shortcode* (Pro). DEMO Renter Agents
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘ANG Timeline’
  3. Activate ‘ANG Timeline’ from your Plugins page.
  4. Visit ‘Timeline > Add New’ and create some posts. (You can always delete these later.)
  5. Go to ‘Appearance’ > ‘Widgets’ and find ‘ANG Timeline widget’. Now you can display your Timeline posts.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download ‘ANG Timeline’.
  2. Upload the ‘ANG Timeline’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate ‘ANG Timeline’ from your Plugins page. (You’ll be greeted with a Welcome page.)
  4. Visit ‘Timeline > Add New’ and create some posts. (You can always delete these later.)
  5. Go to ‘Appearance’ > ‘Widgets’ and find ‘ANG Timeline widget’. Now you can display your Timeline posts.
sections.faq:
Where can I find ANG Timeline documentation and user guides?

For help setting up and configuring ANG Timeline please refer to (http://torbara.com/ ).

Where can I get support or talk to other users?

If you get stuck, you can ask for help in the (http://torbara.com/ ).

Will ANG Timeline work with my theme?

Yes; ANG Timeline will work with any theme.

ANG Timeline is awesome! Can I contribute?

Yes you can! (http://torbara.com/ )

short_description: A complete timeline plugin for creative folks. ANG Timeline creates responsive vertical storyline in chronological, colorful and more attractive order …
